name: Building games with Dojo
description: Build your first Dojo game. We'll walk through the setup, framework, and steps to build a fully onchain game with Dojo. By the end of the session, you'll have your own game deployed to a live katana instance for play testing!

speakers.name: Tarrence Van As
speakers.bio: Tarrence has been building onchain games and tooling for the last two years, starting with the creation of Dope Wars. Today he is the founder of Catrdige Gaming Company and leads the development of Dojo.
